document.full_text: ann curry, who has read the news on nbc's 'today' show for 15 years, will succeed meredith vieira as a co-host of television's dominant morning show.
document.title: ann curry to become a co-host of 'today'
lines_and_colors: ann curry, who has read the news on nbc's 'today' show for 15 years, will succeed meredith vieira as a co-host of television's dominant morning show.
